q_en: For Michael's SweaterAndShorts order, which other products have not been manufactured yet? Please list the types, attributes and quantities of unfinished products.

steps.sql: SELECT pt.description AS product_type, p.attributes, (op.number - COALESCE(ct.completed_number, 0) - COALESCE(st.completed_number, 0)) AS unfinished_quantity FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.user_id = c.id JOIN order_product op ON o.id = op.order_id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT order_product_id, SUM(completed_number) AS completed_number FROM cutting_tasks GROUP BY order_product_id) ct ON op.id = ct.order_product_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT order_product_id, SUM(completed_number) AS completed_number FROM sewing_tasks GROUP BY order_product_id) st ON op.id = st.order_product_id WHERE c.customer_name = 'Michael' AND o.order_name = 'Michael_SweaterAndShorts' AND (op.number - COALESCE(ct.completed_number, 0) - COALESCE(st.completed_number, 0)) > 0;
steps.description: To find the types, attributes, and quantities of unfinished products for the order with customer name 'Michael' and order name 'Michael_SweaterAndShorts', we need to identify the order_id, then find the products associated with this order that have not been fully manufactured by checking the difference between the planned and completed numbers in the order_product table.

response: It looks like there are no unfinished products for the order placed by Michael with the name "Michael_SweaterAndShorts". ðŸŽ‰ Everything seems to be on track and fully manufactured! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. ðŸ˜Š
